title: Gun-Control Support Drops Amid Growing Crime and Firearm Purchases
sub_head: A new survey by Gallup found that 52% of U.S. adults want stricter gun laws and 19% support a ban on handguns
body:
Americansâ€™ support for stricter gun-control measures has fallen to its lowest level since 2014, according to a poll released Wednesday by Gallup.
The results of the October survey come as the number of violent crimes, including murder, has risen and after Americans purchased a record number of guns in 2020.
